headline: Is Now the Right Time to Consider Duke Energy After Recent Renewable Investments?
summary: Curious if Duke Energy is a bargain these days? You are not alone. Many investors are asking if now is the right time to add this reliable utility to their portfolio. Despite a slight dip of 3.2% over the past month, Duke Energy’s stock is up an impressive 14.5% year-to-date, which may indicate renewed optimism among investors. Recently, Duke Energy has been in the news for its focused investments in renewable energy and major infrastructure upgrades. These moves have caught the attention of...
